Uses of Class
edu.rit.draw.item.Size

Packages that use Size
edu.rit.draw Package edu.rit.draw contains classes and programs for drawing diagrams and slides of all kinds. 
edu.rit.draw.item Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing. 
 

Uses of Size in edu.rit.draw
 

Fields in edu.rit.draw declared as Size
static Size Drawing.AUTOMATIC_SIZE
          Signifies that the drawing's display region's size should be determined automatically based on the drawing items in the drawing.
static Size Drawing.NORMAL_SIZE
          The normal display region size (automatic).
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw that return Size
 Size Drawing.size()
          Returns this drawing's display region's size.
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw with parameters of type Size
 Drawing Drawing.size(Size theSize)
          Set this drawing's display region's size.
 

Uses of Size in edu.rit.draw.item
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw.item that return Size
 Size Point.absDifference(Point thePoint)
          Returns a Size object representing the absolute difference between this point and the given point.
 Size Size.add(double incr)
          Returns a new size equal to this size increased by the given amount in both width and height.
 Size Size.add(double wincr, double hincr)
          Returns a new size equal to this size increased by the given amounts in width and height.
 Size Size.ceil()
          Returns a new size with its width and height set to the ceiling of this size's width and height, respectively.
static Size Ellipse.defaultSize()
          Returns the default size for ellipses.
static Size Rectangle.defaultSize()
          Returns the default size for rectangles.
static Size Oval.defaultSize()
          Returns the default size for ovals.
 Size Point.difference(Point thePoint)
          Returns a Size object representing the difference between this point and the given point.
 Size Size.div(double scale)
          Returns a new size equal to this size divided by the given scale factor.
 Size Size.div(double wscale, double hscale)
          Returns a new size equal to this size divided by the given scale factors.
 Size Size.mul(double scale)
          Returns a new size equal to this size multiplied by the given scale factor.
 Size Size.mul(double wscale, double hscale)
          Returns a new size equal to this size multiplied by the given scale factors.
 Size DrawingItem.size()
          Returns the size of this drawing item's bounding box.

          Returns the size of this drawing item's bounding box.
 Size Group.size()
          Returns the size of this group's bounding box.
 Size Polygon.size()
          Returns the size of this polygon's bounding box.
 Size Size.sub(double decr)
          Returns a new size equal to this size decreased by the given amount in both width and height.
 Size Size.sub(double wdecr, double hdecr)
          Returns a new size equal to this size decreased by the given amounts in width and height.

Constructors in edu.rit.draw.item with parameters of type Size

          Construct a new size with the same width and height as the given size.
